headline: CenterPoint Energy (NYSE:CNP) Elects New Directors, Declares US$0.22 Dividend
summary: CenterPoint Energy (NYSE:CNP) recently saw a 12% rise in its share price over the last quarter. This performance came amid significant company developments, including the election of Laurie L. Fitch and Manuel B. Miranda as directors at the annual shareholder meeting and the affirmation of a quarterly cash dividend of $0.22 per share. During the same period, stocks were mixed, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq registering gains while the Dow Jones dropped. CenterPoint's increased share price...
